choose() - 类 Door 中的方法
Sets this door as selected by the player.

D

display() - 类 StudentInfo 中的静态方法
Displays the student information: student name, id, section, etc for each member of the team.
Door - <Unnamed> 中的 类
The class Door stores the information about one of the door: does it have the prize behind it?
Door(String) - 类 Door 的构造方法
Creates an instance of the Door object.
doors - 类 MontyHall 中的变量
 

G

getName() - 类 Door 中的方法
 

H

hasPrize() - 类 Door 中的方法
Checks if the door has the prize.

I

isChosen() - 类 Door 中的方法
Checks if the door is selected by the player.
isOpen() - 类 Door 中的方法
Checks if the door is open.

M

main(String[]) - 类 MontyHall 中的静态方法
The main method of this program.
MontyHall - <Unnamed> 中的 类
The class MontyHall simulates one game.
MontyHall() - 类 MontyHall 的构造方法
Initializes the three doors.

O

oneGame() - 类 MontyHall 中的方法
Simulates one Monty Hall game.
open() - 类 Door 中的方法
Sets this door open.

R

reset() - 类 Door 中的方法
Resets the door to its initial state: closed, without a prize behind it and not chosen by the player.

S

setPrize() - 类 Door 中的方法
Puts the prize behind this door.
StudentInfo - <Unnamed> 中的 类
Contains a method void display() that all the main methods call to display the student information.
